snippet: Hewlett-Packard Co is in a better position today to make acquisitions than in the past year, given its $4.7 billion in net cash and as it evaluates its overall cloud software capability, Chief Executive Officer Meg Whitman said in an interview....

headline.print_headline: HP in Better Position Now to Make Acquisitions: CEO
headline.main: HP in Better Position Now to Make Acquisitions: CEO

lead_paragraph: Hewlett-Packard Co is in a better position today to make acquisitions than in the past year, given its $4.7 billion in net cash and as it evaluates its overall cloud software capability, Chief Executive Officer Meg Whitman said in an interview.
